name: $resourceType
desc: Returns the FHIR type name for this instance

name: $::type
desc: Returns: The type of relationship to the related artifact.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The type of relationship to the related artifact.

name: $display
desc: Returns: A brief description of the document or knowledge resource being referenced, suitable for display to a consumer.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A brief description of the document or knowledge resource being referenced, suitable for display to a consumer.

name: $citation
desc: Returns: A bibliographic citation for the related artifact. This text SHOULD be formatted according to an accepted citation format.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A bibliographic citation for the related artifact. This text SHOULD be formatted according to an accepted citation format.

name: $url
desc: Returns: A url for the artifact that can be followed to access the actual content.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A url for the artifact that can be followed to access the actual content.

name: $document
desc: Returns: The document being referenced, represented as an attachment. This is exclusive with the resource element.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The document being referenced, represented as an attachment. This is exclusive with the resource element.

name: $resource
desc: Returns: The related resource, such as a library, value set, profile, or other knowledge resource.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The related resource, such as a library, value set, profile, or other knowledge resource.
